src_original: KP.20 catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisattvasyāprameyā puṇyasambhārāḥ katame catvāraḥ nirāmiṣacittasyā
tgt_original: 菩薩有四無量福德莊嚴事，依欲起發眾生令捨故說四處。 何等四處？

src_original: apetaśīle karuṇā ca tīvrā
tgt_original: 於破戒人而生大悲者，迴彼墮惡道眾生故。

src_original: pareṣu bodhāya janeti cittam /  kṣāntyādhiseveti ca durbaleṣu  dharmeṣva...... saṅgrahatā......coktā /  etā niṣevitvā jinā bhavanti  te bodhisattve sadā sevitavyāḥ
tgt_original: 稱揚讚歎勸化一切眾生菩提心者，迴彼樂小乘之心故。

src_original: KP.21 catvāra ime kāśyapa dharmā bodhisattvasya avidyābhāgīyākleśasamati kramāya saṃvartante /
tgt_original: 說菩薩有四種超過無明煩惱地法。

src_original: katame catvāraḥ śīlasaṃvaraḥ saddharmaparigrahaḥ pradīpadānam antamaśaḥ saṃstutebhyaḥ ime kāśyapa catvāro dharmā bodhisattvasya avidyābhāgīyākleśasamatikramāya saṃvartante //
tgt_original: 何等為四？ 以持禁戒攝取正法，及施光明、世世資用乃至同意，是名四法超過無明煩惱地。

src_original: KP.22 catvāra ime kāśyapa dharmā bodhisattvasya anāvaraṇajñānatāye saṃvartante /  katame catvāraḥ yaduta indriyasaṃvaraḥ gambhīrārthavivaraṇatā svalābhenāvamanyanā /  paralābhesvanadhya.......... natā /
tgt_original: 菩薩有四無障礙，令得具足無障礙智。

src_original: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya cikitsā /
tgt_original: 煩惱散者，對治彼故說四正勤；

src_original: sarvakuśaladharmapāripūryaiḥ saṃvartante /  catvāro dṛddhipādāḥ kāyacittapiṇḍagrāhotsargāya saṃvate /  cikitsāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni aśrādvyakausīdyamuṣitasmṛticittavikṣepaasamprajanyatāduṣprajñātācikitsāḥ
tgt_original: 迭互我慢所縛者故，對治說諸如意足； 離修諸善故，對治彼說諸根及力；

src_original: sapta bodhyaṅgāni dharmasamūhājñānasya cikitsāḥ āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga dauṣprajñāsarvaparapravādināṃ  kumārgapratipannānāṃ cikitsāḥ iyamucyate kāśyapa bhūtacikitsāḥ tatra kāśyapa bodhisattvena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
tgt_original: 不達諸諦故，對治說諸覺道分； 及喜好吉凶等見，對治故說諸道分。 云何不順觀身墮身見，若我所見不分別，背善治法不信等應知。

src_original: KP.96 yāvanta kāśyapa jāmbudvīpe vaidyā vā vaidyāntevāsino vā sarveṣāṃ teṣām jivako vaidyarājā agro mākhyāyate /  yāvantaḥ kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvāḥ te sarve jīvakavaidyarājasadṛśā bhaveyuḥ te sarve paripṛccheran /
tgt_original: 彼對治故，說諸根及力。 「迦葉！ 所有閻浮提內諸醫師及醫師弟子中，耆婆醫王最為第一。 迦葉！

src_original: KP.97 tatra kataraṃ lokottaraṃ jñānabhaiṣajyaṃ /
tgt_original: 何者出世間智？

src_original: yadidaṃ hetupratyayajñānaḥ nairātmyeniḥsattvaḥnirjīvaniṣpoṣanīṣpudgaleṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktijñānaṃ /
tgt_original: 如是伏貪瞋癡煩惱染處，及所有微細使煩惱對治事智。 彼復何者？ 於彼伏對治中善巧三處，所謂緣智、善巧、因緣。 無我、無眾生、無命、無養育、無富伽羅法中生信智，可信人無我故，於空無分別法中不生怖故。

src_original: śūnyatānupalambheṣu dharmeṣu anutrāsaḥ cittaparigaveṣatāye vīryaṃ /
tgt_original: 信法無我故，求心生精進，所有盡度，過諸煩惱。 對治教四種： 無智不取故，觀內心用意於智，同相、自相、染相及淨相。 於無智是中有三種想同想義應知。

src_original: sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate /
tgt_original: 彼如是求心。

src_original: kataraṃ cittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā /  atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā pratyutpannaṃ vā /
tgt_original: 何者心？ 可樂、可染、可恥，為過去未來現在所有。

src_original: yādanāgataṃ cittaṃ tadasamprāptaḥ atha pratyutpannasya cittasya sthitirnāsti /  KP.98 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa na bahirdhā nobhayāyomantarāle upalabhyate /
tgt_original: 「迦葉！ 是心不在內、不在外、不在中間」，覺故如是心求不可得，如本說假名說性不可得故。

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa arūpyanidarśanam apratigham anābhāsam avijñāptikam apratiṣṭhitam
tgt_original: 是心無色無形、無住無相、無記無著。

src_original: aniketaḥ cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhairna dṛṣṭaṃ na paśyanti na paśyiṣyanti na drakṣyanti  yatsarvabuddhairna dṛṣtaṃ na paśyanti na drakṣyanti kīdṛśastasya pracāro draṣṭavyaṃ
tgt_original: 如是如前六種相，知真如故，一切言諸佛不已見、不今見、不當見故，一切諸聖不以知見覺故。 種相故心有染相應知。

src_original: nānyatra vitathaviparyāsapatitāyā santatyā dharmāḥ pravartante 3 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa  māyāsadṛśamm abhūtaṃ vikalpya vividhopapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti 4 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa vāyusadṛśaṃ
tgt_original: 不順不順故，及行行故，故心如幻。 以虛妄憶想分別起，種種業行生，受種種身心，諸道中受種種身生。

src_original: dūraṅgamam agrāhyam apracāra 5 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotasadṛśamm anavastitam utpannaṃ
tgt_original: 不順染故，心如流水。 生滅不住者，還彼生以自順念念流故。 心如風遠行去不可捉者，一切念中難治。

src_original: bhagnavilīna 6 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa pradīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate / jvalati ca 7
tgt_original: 順行故心如燈焰。 眾因緣有行者，受潤自在，順行染故，隨所行而能行故，此是行染。

src_original: KP.99 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa vidyusadṛśa kṣaṇabhaṅgāvyavasthitaṃ 8 /
tgt_original: 何處行心如電？

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa ākāśasadṛśam āgantukerupakleśe saṅkiśyate 9 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa vānarasadṛśa
tgt_original: 或向作善處行，或如電生善心時心如虛空，或向不善知如虛，客塵煩惱染故。

src_original: viṣayābhilāṣi vicitrakarmasaṃsthānatayā 10 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa citrakārsadṛśa vicitrakarmābhisaṃskaraṇatayā /  11 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa anavasthitaṃ nānākleśapravartanatayā cittaṃ hi kāśyapa ekacaram
tgt_original: 心如獼猴，一向貪諸境界故。 心如畫師，一向起作諸業行故。 「迦葉！
